definition: Chang'an (ancient name of Xi'an 西安[Xi1 an1]) capital of China during Tang Dynasty 唐朝[Tang2 chao2]/now 長安區|长安区[Chang2 an1 Qu1], a district of Xi'an
length/long/forever/always/constantly
chief/head/elder/to grow/to develop/to increase/to enhance
surname An
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
Chang'an District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi/Chang'an District of Shijiazhuang City 石家莊市|石家庄市[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 Shi4], Hebei
Chang'an University

sentences.english: The whole trip took him 19 years before he returned to Chang'an.
sentences.chinese: 花了整整十九年的时间，最后回到了长安。

sentences.english: Keep going along Chang An Road and turn left at the first traffic lights.
sentences.chinese: 沿着长安路笔直走，到第一个红绿灯后左转。

sentences.english: What are your feelings about the recent CFMA Employee Communication meeting?
sentences.chinese: 你对于今天的长安福特马自达沟通会议总体感受是？

sentences.english: My name is Lu Wei. I am beside Beijing Hotel on Changan Street.
sentences.chinese: 人叫陆伟，正在长安街北京饭店旁边。

sentences.english: The formation of the Chang' an imperial capital culture had the special social reasons and the geography factors.
sentences.chinese: 长安帝京文化的形成有着特殊的社会原因和地理因素。

sentences.english: Is Chang-an red the eye socket point nod, Zuan in the hand of tightly.
sentences.chinese: 长安红着眼眶点点头，手里攥的紧紧地。

sentences.english: I look back Chang'an hilltop embroidered in multicolor.
sentences.chinese: 长安回望绣成堆，山顶千门次第开。

sentences.english: Turn left there and you will see Chang'an Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 在那儿向左拐，你就会看到长安街了。

sentences.english: In ancient times Xi’an was called Chang’an, which means, literally, long lasting peace and security. The city witnessed many major events in China’s history.
sentences.chinese: 西安古名为长安，字面意思为“长久的和平与安定”。

sentences.english: At the time of writing, the capital of the Tang Dynasty, Chang'an, was already captured by rebel forces.
sentences.chinese: 写这首诗时，唐代的都城长安已经被叛军占领。

sentences.english: QinQiong came to changan, suddenly by a masked people appointment.
sentences.chinese: 秦琼来到长安，忽然被一蒙面人士约见。

sentences.english: I am currently a student at Chang'an, Xi'an University of Technology campus.
sentences.chinese: 我就读于西安科技大学的长安校区。

sentences.english: Changan is one of China’s six biggest auto groups.
sentences.chinese: 长安汽车是中国六大汽车集团之一。

sentences.english: The following shots were taken at the Chang'anshan Park, a park built on a mountain.
sentences.chinese: 下面几张都是在师大长安山公园拍的。

sentences.english: In ancient times Xi'an was called Chang'an, which means, literally, long lasting peace and security.
sentences.chinese: 西安古名为长安，字面意思为“长久的和平与安定”。

sentences.english: Go east and go all the way along Changan Avenue. The World Trade Center is on your left.
sentences.chinese: 往东沿着长安街走到头，世贸就在你的左手边。
